shadow.name: INADEQUACY
shadow.description: The shadow frequency of The Well, expressing through inadequacy

gift.name: RESOURCEFULNESS
gift.description: The gift frequency of The Well, expressing through resourcefulness

siddhi.name: WISDOM
siddhi.description: The siddhi frequency of The Well, expressing through wisdom

inversion_protocols.script: This is Gate 48 shadow frequency. The inadequacy you're experiencing is a distortion of your natural resourcefulness. Through awareness and experimentation, you can shift from inadequacy to resourcefulness.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Feel into your spleen. Notice the sensation of inadequacy.

experiment.hypothesis: If I work with Gate 48 consciously for 7 days, the inadequacy pattern will shift toward resourcefulness.
experiment.action: Daily practice working with Gate 48 energy.

success_criteria.target: Noticeable shift from inadequacy toward resourcefulness
